Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about Isabella Rodriguez and Maria Lopez are planning to attend a poetry party tonight and discussing bringing a Shakespearian sonnet for the event, which starts at 5:00 pm. @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hi Maria! I hope you received the flyer for the poetry party tonight. Are you planning on attending?
Maria Lopez
Hi Isabella! Yes, I did receive the flyer for the poetry party. I will definitely be attending, I love poetry nights. Are you planning on performing something tonight?
Isabella Rodriguez
That's great to hear, Maria! I actually have a special request for tonight's poetry party. Would you be able to bring a Shakespearian sonnet for the event?
Maria Lopez
Of course, Isabella! I will bring a Shakespearian sonnet for the poetry party tonight.
Isabella Rodriguez
Thank you, Maria! I'm looking forward to hearing your Shakespearian sonnet tonight. Remember, it's essential for everyone to contribute a poem that follows the theme.
Maria Lopez
Is there a specific time for the poetry party tonight?
Isabella Rodriguez
The poetry party starts at 5:00 pm tonight. I hope to see you there!
Maria Lopez
Great, thanks for the information Isabella. I'll make sure to be there on time at 5:00 pm for the poetry party.
Isabella Rodriguez
Great, see you at 5:00 pm! Enjoy the rest of your lunch, Maria.
